attributes.action: Review Tier 2 ICT to ILR qualify criteria extend few more years beyond Apr 2010
attributes.additional_details:
Gov.uk Link: https://www.gov.uk/settle-in-the-uk/y/you-have-a-work-visa/tier-2-intra-company-transfer-visa

Since there are none who qualify the current criteria it should be reviewed and extended to few more years. 
So, please enable ILR for Tier 2 ICT Visa holders under 5-year rule. This will enable few people like me who have worked hard in UK continuously for 5 or 6(if initially came on ICT short term for a year) years to switch to ILR.
attributes.background: As per the current rules, Tier 2 ICT Visa holders which was issued before April 2010 are eligible for ILR. Like me there are few people who are going to complete 5 years by Jan 2020. Since we applied after 2010 we are not able to apply for ILR.
